block.p: AIRGAS INC., Radnor, Pa., a distributor of industrial, medical and specialty gases, said that it would take a pretax charge of $25 million in its fourth quarter and that it expected its operating profit to fall short of analysts' estimates as it reorganizes and sells off several businesses.
COMPAQ COMPUTER CORP., Houston, bought a minority stake in the closely held Inex Corp., Toronto, a provider of Internet commerce applications software, for an undisclosed price.
BEST BUY CO., Eden Prairie, Minn., a consumer electronics retailer, will split its shares 2 for 1, payable May 26 to shareholders of record on May 11.
